text:
LeanData | Front-end Tech Lead | ONSITE | Bay Area, CA

We are looking for a Front-end Tech Lead to join our fast-paced team and take ownership of and set the standard for our front-end code. An ideal candidate should have a strong eye for both the technical and aesthetic dimensions of UI/UX, strong opinions about coding and design best practices, and an instinct for refining operational efficiency.

·Knowledge of all of the following: Javascript, HTML5, CSS ·Knowledge of some or all of the following: Vue, Backbone, React, ES6, Webpack, HTML5, SCSS, jQuery, Ant, SVG, D3, Ember, Angular, Grunt, Gulp ·Passion for best practices ·Keen design sensibility ·Thrive in a fast-paced environment in a rapidly growing startup ·Ability to understand customer needs and translate those into software features ·Entrepreneurial spirit

Interested? Reach out to jeff@leandatainc.com.
